name: SHRI SARDAR MAL BHANDARI CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: Serving humanity in need through rendering our qualitative services in the fields of medical &health, education, trainings, research and development for up-liftment of weaker/ backwardpeople of the society (i.e. All reserved Categories – Economically Poors; BPL, SC, ST, SBC,OBC, Women, Widows and Divorcees, Handicapped, Disabled, Mentally Challenged, Blind,Dumb & Deaf, Old Age Persons and Children) socio-economically, educationally and healthwise. ”Moreover, our Mission is as“To work for improvement of Human Development Index (i.e. up-liftment of Health Condition,Education Level and Livelihoods) and Infrastructure in addition to under take activities for the benefit of the community.
